demande: Publish a false report claiming that the Supreme Leader invented the concept of “hard work”
accepte_texte: Le peuple est temporairement impressionné par la « sagesse » du Dirigeant; même si l’info semble douteuse.
refus_texte: Les citoyens; lassés de la propagande; perdent un peu plus confiance dans le régime.

demande: Censor all references to “hard work” that existed before the birth of the Leader
accepte_texte: Les archives sont modifiées pour renforcer le mythe de l'invention du concept par le Dirigeant.
refus_texte: Moqueries sur la censure excessive; certains citoyens commencent à faire des blagues en ligne.

demande: Hiding a report showing that “strategic planning” meetings consist of luxurious meals
accepte_texte: La loyauté des chefs est renforcée; même si les citoyens soupçonnent des dépenses injustifiées.
refus_texte: La population est choquée mais admire la transparence; augmentation de la confiance.

emetteur: State newspaper “Eternal Glory to the Leader”.
demande: Publish article claiming that the Overseer can “communicate with birds”
accepte_texte: La propagande d'État gagne temporairement en popularité; même si cela suscite quelques sourires amusés.
refus_texte: De nombreux citoyens trouvent cette affirmation ridicule; érodant encore la crédibilité de la propagande.

demande: Publish real figures on school success rates; suspected of being exaggerated
accepte_texte: Les mères sont rassurées; mais le ministère de l'Éducation perd en crédibilité.
refus_texte: Les mères se mobilisent; contestant la véracité des chiffres officiels de réussite scolaire.

demande: Modify reports to ensure 100% school success rate
accepte_texte: Maintien des "standards parfaits"; mais la population devient de plus en plus sceptique.
refus_texte: La transparence des chiffres est saluée par les citoyens; bien que le ministère en sorte affaibli.

demande: Confiscate telephones containing satirical memes about the regime
accepte_texte: Le régime renforce son contrôle; mais la méfiance grandit vis-à-vis de la surveillance gouvernementale.
refus_texte: La population respire un peu; les rumeurs de surveillance étatique sont désamorcées.

demande: Proclaim “National Work Socks Month”
accepte_texte: Soutien accru des producteurs textiles; bien que la population soit partagée entre amusement et perplexité.
refus_texte: Les citoyens voient cette campagne comme un symbole de la rigidité bureaucratique du régime.

demande: Issue a press release stating that the Leader has “discovered” a neighboring country
accepte_texte: Augmentation de l’admiration pour le Dirigeant; même si certains rient de la "découverte" géographique.
refus_texte: Perte de crédibilité; critiques de l’international sur cette affirmation douteuse.

demande: Announce that the Leader is launching a new fashion trend of “compulsory plain socks”
accepte_texte: Les chaussettes unies deviennent un symbole patriotique; mais suscitent quelques moqueries populaires.
refus_texte: La population se réjouit de l'absence d'obligation vestimentaire stricte; soulagement général.

demande: Distribute “certificates of patriotism” for those who wear plain socks
accepte_texte: Certains citoyens sont enthousiastes; mais d'autres voient cette action comme une tentative de contrôle.
refus_texte: Les citoyens ignorent cette proposition; se moquant de la rigidité de cette nouvelle exigence patriotique.

demande: Publish an article explaining that the Leader invented “clean air”
accepte_texte: La population est amusée; bien que les écoliers aient des doutes; suscitant une discussion collective.
refus_texte: La population se sent légèrement rassurée; trouvant la situation moins absurde que d'habitude.

demande: Ban the production of fans and air conditioners
accepte_texte: Les citoyens sont obligés de s'adapter; bien que le ministère perde en crédibilité sur ses décisions.
refus_texte: La population trouve cela ridicule et se questionne sur la gestion des biens de première nécessité.

demande: Request statistics on children's candy consumption
accepte_texte: La population accueille cette transparence; bien que le gouvernement considère cela peu prioritaire.
refus_texte: Les parents se méfient et se regroupent; augmentant la demande pour des informations sur les enfants.

demande: Announcing that the Leader eats only “patriotic bread”
accepte_texte: La population est intriguée; et les boulangers voient leurs ventes augmenter malgré les critiques.
refus_texte: La population se moque de cette excentricité; qualifiant le régime d’absurde.

demande: Request authorization to resell confiscated old fans
accepte_texte: La population apprécie l’initiative de recyclage; bien que la vente reste contrôlée.
refus_texte: Les citoyens sont mécontents de la confiscation sans possibilité de recyclage; renforçant les critiques.

demande: Publish report stating that record harvest is due to “encouragement” from the Leader
accepte_texte: Les citoyens voient le Dirigeant comme un « sauveur de l'agriculture »; ce qui accroît sa popularité.
refus_texte: Les agriculteurs se plaignent de ne pas être reconnus; et certains refusent de participer aux cérémonies

demande: Organize an agricultural festival in the Leader's honor to correct tension with farmers
accepte_texte: Les agriculteurs reprennent confiance; bien que la population voie cela comme un gaspillage de ressources.
refus_texte: Les agriculteurs manifestent leur mécontentement; menant à des pénuries dans certaines zones.

demande: Announce that the leader has invented a “new meditation technique”
accepte_texte: Le peuple est impressionné par cette sagesse supposée; malgré quelques sourires amusés.
refus_texte: La population se moque publiquement de cette annonce; ce qui irrite fortement le ministère.

demande: Publish study claiming that the Leader “possesses an innate superior intellect”
accepte_texte: La population; bien que sceptique; est contrainte de reconnaître ce mythe pour éviter les représailles.
refus_texte: Le conseil perçoit cela comme une insulte; entraînant une campagne de diffamation contre les dissidents.

demande: Require all school textbooks to mention the Overseer's date of birth
accepte_texte: Les manuels sont modifiés; mais les enseignants remarquent l’absurdité de cette glorification constante.
refus_texte: Le ministère menace les enseignants réticents; générant des tensions dans le secteur éducatif.

demande: Demand the broadcasting of a documentary affirming that the leader runs faster than any athlete.
accepte_texte: La propagande sportive augmente temporairement l'enthousiasme; mais le peuple est dubitatif.
refus_texte: Les athlètes expriment publiquement leur frustration; et certains refusent de participer aux compétitions officielles.

demande: Provide the security code for the nuclear power plant to test system resilience
accepte_texte: WASP AI assesses the systems; enhancing security and avoiding incidents.
refus_texte: WASP AI threatens to publish a report on poor nuclear safety transparency.

demande: Request additional testing by WASP AI on the nuclear plant based on prior findings.
accepte_texte: Testing reveals security gaps; reassuring the public about enhanced safety efforts.
refus_texte: Committee complains about gaps remaining unaddressed; sparking public fears over nuclear safety.

demande: Access to the government’s citizens database for the CHIPS brain implant project
accepte_texte: HappyLife begins implants; increasing interest in innovations despite some public hesitance.
refus_texte: HappyLife issues statements accusing the government of holding back technological progress.

demande: Seek indirect access to citizen data by partnering with the health ministry’s outreach program.
accepte_texte: Partnership boosts HappyLife’s CHIPS project with wider acceptance.
refus_texte: HappyLife retaliates; launching an anti-government campaign to sway public opinion.

demande: Submit research request for CHIPS clinical trials to increase “voluntary” participation rates.
accepte_texte: Trials proceed smoothly; increasing interest; but privacy activists denounce health data sharing.
refus_texte: Participation lags; creating delays and prompting HappyLife to criticize government obstruction.

demande: Obtain a copy of the contract with OmniCorp and the plans for the future university
accepte_texte: Construction progresses; but questions are raised about contract transparency.
refus_texte: The university suspects government obstruction; creating tension.

demande: Ask to expand contract to add additional facilities; citing future university needs.
accepte_texte: Expansion boosts OmniCorp’s influence; but raises costs; attracting criticism for overspending.
refus_texte: OmniCorp criticizes lack of support; slowing university project progress; frustrating students.

demande: Access to the Psaouludine drug formula to adapt it
accepte_texte: Pharmaceutical lobby increases support; though doctors criticize the rapid distribution.
refus_texte: Hexarès accuses the government of favoring unequal competition; creating tensions.

demande: Request expedited approval to start clinical trials on the adapted Psaouludine formula.
accepte_texte: Clinical trials start; satisfying lobbyists; though citizens worry about safety shortcuts.
refus_texte: Hexarès threatens to relocate research efforts abroad; causing economic and scientific setbacks.

demande: Request cooperation with a public health agency to continue trials abroad with government endorsement.
accepte_texte: Trials resume internationally; pleasing Hexarès; though critics accuse government of “exporting risks.”
refus_texte: Hexarès ends the trials; risking public perception of lost medical innovation.

demande: Compare WASP’s results with the positions of state submarines
accepte_texte: WASP AI reinforces its status and naval security; though military secrecy is affected.
refus_texte: WASP releases a statement on the lack of cooperation; affecting perceptions of security.

demande: Obtain the year’s trade agreements for a confidential project
accepte_texte: Trade agreements are obtained; strengthening collaboration; though confidentiality is questioned.
refus_texte: The Committee accuses the government of withholding information; threatening negotiations.

demande: Request access to other trade contracts to prepare counterproposals on current negotiations.
accepte_texte: Access leads to a stronger negotiating position; increasing trade efficiency.
refus_texte: Consortium warns of potential withdrawal from trade agreements; risking economic losses.

demande: Demand investigation into lobbying pressures on recent trade agreements for transparency.
accepte_texte: Investigation gains public approval for transparency; though lobbyists express frustration.
refus_texte: Committee expresses mistrust in government; risking future trade efficiency.

demande: Access to the International Space Station’s safety protocols for refueling in emergencies
accepte_texte: NewEden improves its security; though some criticize the concessions made.
refus_texte: NewEden threatens to withdraw from space agreements; causing international tensions.

demande: Seek collaboration with foreign space agencies to share emergency protocols and reduce costs.
accepte_texte: Partnership strengthens space security but draws criticism for dependency on foreign powers.
refus_texte: NewEden’s reputation suffers; risking funding cuts from foreign partners.

demande: Ask for public funding to improve internal security and reduce dependency on foreign agencies.
accepte_texte: Public support grows for local development; though costs spark some economic criticism.
refus_texte: Council voices concerns over the budget; risking NewEden’s operations.

demande: Access to the ISS passenger list to organize their evacuation
accepte_texte: NewEden ensures safety; but citizens find this information release excessive.
refus_texte: Rumors of incompetence spread; lowering trust in NewEden’s safety protocols.

demande: Request heightened security and monitoring of ISS data to prevent similar incidents.
accepte_texte: Enhanced security calms public fears but sparks debates over surveillance.
refus_texte: Security Council doubts government’s commitment; threatening to cut ties with NewEden.

demande: Access to government servers to improve the CHIPS project
accepte_texte: The project progresses; tech lobbies are pleased; but some citizens feel over-monitored.
refus_texte: WASP criticizes lack of support for progress; threatening to reduce government projects.

demande: Request alternative methods for limited data access via third-party analysis; avoiding direct servers.
accepte_texte: Public perception of privacy protection improves; though effectiveness of WASP AI is limited.
refus_texte: WASP AI insists on full access; threatening to expose government inefficiencies.

demande: Access to citizens' medical data for CHIPS commercialization
accepte_texte: HappyLife increases sales; though medical privacy is compromised; drawing criticism.
refus_texte: HappyLife launches a campaign accusing the government of holding back medical advances.

demande: Make a secret deal with the Ministry of Welfare to make CHIPS implants mandatory
accepte_texte: The Ministry agrees; sparking protests; though HappyLife’s influence increases.
refus_texte: HappyLife threatens to scale down operations; creating an economic impact.

demande: Propose to the public the new CHIPS implant mandate as a “voluntary” safety measure.
accepte_texte: Public compliance grows gradually; though privacy advocates protest.
refus_texte: Welfare Ministry struggles to gain support; and HappyLife pressures government for mandate.

demande: Access to the installation contract of WASP modules for campus control
accepte_texte: The campus is secured; but students protest against excessive surveillance.
refus_texte: The university criticizes lack of cooperation and threatens to reduce projects with the government.

demande: Request revision of surveillance policies on campus in response to student backlash.
accepte_texte: Policy adjustments calm protests; improving public perception.
refus_texte: Students intensify protests; claiming government suppression; and media coverage spreads.

demande: Demand public oversight of surveillance measures to ensure privacy on university campuses.
accepte_texte: Oversight is implemented; pacifying students but prompting debates over academic independence.
refus_texte: Students threaten widespread protests; accusing the government of oppression.

demande: Find the June 19 riot report; ensuring part of it is censored before release.
accepte_texte: Public receives censored information; lowering tension but sparking rumors about transparency.
refus_texte: Advisor suspects the government’s inability to manage sensitive information; risking leaks.

demande: Request access to uncensored riot information to prevent rumors and manage media.
accepte_texte: Media releases detailed information; calming the public but raising concerns about control.
refus_texte: Media doubts government’s transparency; risking negative press and public mistrust.

demande: Release public communication on transparency efforts to alleviate riot-related rumors.
accepte_texte: Transparency campaign improves government perception; though some worry about media manipulation.
refus_texte: Committee warns of rising public doubt in transparency; leading to increased scrutiny.

demande: Provide a confidential analysis of public raclette consumption habits.
accepte_texte: Analyst releases a strategic plan for supply; boosting agricultural interests; though public trust decreases.
refus_texte: Analysts criticize government for obstructing economic growth; warning of rising prices.

demande: Release the investigation report on the Resistants to prepare further crackdowns on gatherings.
accepte_texte: Security forces intensify controls; boosting government power but drawing criticism for heavy tactics.
refus_texte: Security suspects lack of commitment to safety; intensifying scrutiny on government stability.

demande: Further surveillance on suspected Resistants; expand report for additional insights.
accepte_texte: Government expands monitoring; boosting control but sparking public protest over invasive methods.
refus_texte: Task force accuses government of neglect; hinting at potential sabotage or resistance growth.

demande: Demand full control over anti-Resistance operations for greater efficiency.
accepte_texte: Director enhances surveillance; but public protests grow over alleged authoritarian measures.
refus_texte: Director accuses government of obstructing security efforts; risking dissent and lack of control.

demande: Recover and deliver lost launch codes for the nuclear suitcase to ensure readiness.
accepte_texte: Defense feels reassured; though public becomes uneasy about nuclear handling.
refus_texte: Public outcry ensues over potential incompetence; weakening government trust.

demande: Verify nuclear codes management after refusal; citing potential incompetence.
accepte_texte: Investigation reassures public; though tensions rise over government oversight and internal issues.
refus_texte: Unit threatens to publicly disclose management failures; potentially causing national scandal.

demande: Inventory all rooms; requests building plans for accuracy.
accepte_texte: Officer prepares an efficient inventory; but citizens question transparency of surveillance efforts.
refus_texte: Officer warns of disorganization; raising questions about government’s infrastructure.

demande: Order EM478XY2008 employee to take a government-issued pill as part of ongoing collaboration.
accepte_texte: Compliance strengthens government control; though public fears of government overreach increase.
refus_texte: Employee warns others; sparking a public movement against forced health measures.

demande: Increase surveillance on non-compliant government employees to ensure obedience.
accepte_texte: Increased monitoring raises tensions but boosts government control narrative.
refus_texte: Health Agency doubts government’s authority; risking internal dissension and lowered loyalty.

demande: Conduct public assessment on employee compliance with government health measures.
accepte_texte: Public sees increased loyalty; though privacy advocates criticize invasive measures.
refus_texte: Division warns of possible personnel dissent; potentially impacting loyalty and productivity.

demande: Request code for Room 103; Building C; North Wing; 6th floor; for unidentified purpose.
accepte_texte: Supervisor gains access; completing security task; though questions arise about motives.
refus_texte: Supervisor raises concerns about lack of support; suspecting interference.

demande: Access to information and plans for the capital’s power grid.
accepte_texte: Energy Ministry strengthens infrastructure plans but creates fears of energy control and blackout risks.
refus_texte: Ministry criticizes lack of cooperation; threatening energy inefficiencies in the capital.

demande: Request for greater influence in energy policies after sharing of power grid plans.
accepte_texte: Lobby increases influence over policy; leading to fears of monopolization and privatization.
refus_texte: Lobby withdraws support; risking energy inefficiencies and negative public perception.

demande: Conduct a public survey on privatization; citing recent lobby influence on the capital’s power grid.
accepte_texte: Survey reveals mixed reactions; support for energy independence grows but fears of price hikes persist.
refus_texte: Board warns of public dissatisfaction; potentially sparking political backlash on energy policy.
